page.title: 09Social Concerns
page.content: Social Concern (continued) ------------------------- each one endeavours to live up to the main aim of C.A.B. -to ensure that individuals do not suffer through ignorance of their rights and responsibilities or of the services available, or through an inability to express their needs effectively. the past year has seen a rise of 30% in the number of clients. The main areas of need were cosumer, family and personal, employment, social security and housing,reflecting the general problems of the present time.
